name.ja: <ruby>刻まれし魔の大聖棺<rt>デモンスミス・セクエンツィア</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2 monsters, including a LIGHT Fiend monster
During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fiend Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling its materials from your GY into the Deck. You can target 1 non-Link LIGHT Fiend monster you control; equip this card from your field or GY to that monster you control as an Equip Spell with this effect.
● Your opponent cannot target the equipped monster with card effects.
You can only use each effect of "Fiendsmith Sequentia" once per turn.

materials: 2 monsters, including a LIGHT Fiend monster
